name: Beelliards
description:
How To Play: 

You are a bee.  
 Get your bee buddies back to work making honey by knocking them into the hive!
 Bump into other bees to score points!
 Knock bees into other bees for even more points!
 Hitting the same bee twice in a row will not grant any points, no farming!

Controls: 

Just Click , Aim, and Release! 
(Hold R/Esc to Reset the game)

Made for  Quarantine Jam 

Music:

"8-Bit Puzzler" by Eric Matyas
"Racing Heart" by James Hammond
